title: If the land for industrial unit is acquired under the provisions of relevant Land Acquisition Act, t
clause_text: If the land for industrial unit is acquired under the provisions of relevant Land Acquisition Act, then prior permission of the Government is necessary before permitting residential use on such lands and additional items and conditions mentioned in Land and Revenue Department,

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: If the land for industrial unit is acquired under the provisions of relevant Land Acquisition Act, then prior permission of the Government is necessary before permitting residential use on such lands
